title: Can we get a fix on the sound issues sometime soon?
body:
A lot of people (including myself) have had severe FPS issues since patch 6.6, in which the sound files started causing poor FPS in game. 

It has come to a lot of peoples' attention that disabling ALL sound in game does the trick - as it does with me.

However, playing without sound makes the game INCREDIBLY difficult to play - pings are muted so you must rely on only your sight, with no aid from your ears. 

I don't suffer the problem as bad as other people do - I usually drop to around 40fps during late game skirmishes, and hardly hold 60 post 40 minutes.

Rito, it's been 6 months - Can we have a fix soon?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like you may have some corrupt sound assets, that or your computer is rather poor and does not meet the recommended system requirements to play league smoothly with sounds on low quality.

Could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
